title: Green Tech falls short against Mount Vernon in Class AA title game – The Daily Gazette - The Daily Gazette
content: Green Tech falls short against Mount Vernon in Class AA title game – The Daily Gazette  The Daily Gazette
description: GLENS FALLS — Seeking its first state title since 2014, the Green Tech boys’ basketball team ran into an undefeated Mount Vernon team that was looking for its eighth Class AA crown since 2000.The Section I champion-Knights added another state plaque to their collection Saturday, outscoring the Secti
